name: Adjustable Silver ring
description:
This ring has been made with fine silver and Swarovski crystals soldered onto a sterling silver adjustable ring.

The front of this ring measures approx. 17mm x 17mm

Matching cufflinks and necklace also available (Necklace shown in picture 2)

name: Personalised Cuff Links
description:
These cufflinks made in fine silver have a deep pattern which has been aged to bring out the detail. Show your loved one how much you care by personalising with something special hand carved on the back of the cufflinks (limited wording due to size).

Cufflinks measure approx 17mm. Disks are fine silver, cufflinks arms are sterling silver.

name: Holly Candle Dish
description:
Cream glass fired with a holly design which won't fade or wear away with time. 

Perfect for your Christmas candles

name: Landscape Coasters
description:
Hand made glass coasters.  Limited edition glass coasters.  The pattern in the glass has created an individual landscape on each coaster

Set of 4. Each coaster measures 10cm x 10cm

name: Firey Dichroic Necklace
description:
This pendant has been completely hand created, from the glass nugget to the bail made from fine silver strands

The beauty of dichroic glass cannot be captured in a photograph.  The light bounces off it creating amazing sparkle and shimmer

name: Dichroic Glass Necklace
description:
This pendant has been completely hand made from hand cutting, layering and firing the glass to decorating with fine silver strands.  

This pendant comes complete with a 16" sparkly ball chain

name: Polka Dot Coasters
description:
Hand made fused glass polka dot coasters

Each polka dot has been hand cut and fired before firing again on the coasters.  These coasters have been properly annealed for strength and durability.

Rubber bumpers have been permanently attached to protect your furniture.  

Please keep out of the dishwasher and microwave

These coasters are available in any colour combination.  Please contact me for details

name: Apple Blossom
description:
An interesting piece of wall art which has been created using glass paints, powders and crushed glass.  It has had several firings in the kiln to create the 3d effect.

This piece includes an invisible fixing which allows the light to shine through the back.  Screw and rawlplug included.

Measures 31cm x 15cm

name: Bubble dish
description:
The bubbles in this dish have been created by carefully layering up stringers of glass and firing in the kiln.  The air is trapped between each stringer creating a sparkling little bubble. 

Other colours available, please contact me for details 

Dish measures 20cm x 20cm and is 2cm deep

name: Bright Blue Cufflinks
description:
Dichroic Glass on silver plated cufflink arms. Each piece of glass has been hand cut, layered and then fired in the kiln.

It is not possible to capture the beauty of dichroic in a photograph. The glass catches the light giving it unique sparkle and shimmer.

name: Deep Purple Dichroic Cufflinks
description:
Dichroic Glass on silver plated cufflink arms. Each piece of glass has been hand cut, layered and then fired in the kiln.

It is not possible to capture the beauty of dichroic in a photograph. The glass catches the light giving it unique sparkle and shimmer.

name: Black and Red ornate coasters - Set of 4
description:
Set of 4 coasters, hand made by fusing glass powders on top of two sheets of glass. These coasters come with rubber bumpers to protect your furniture

Other colours available, please contact me for details

Coasters measure approx 10cm x 10cm

description:

description:

These cufflinks are mainly a yellow/gold/green changing to bluey green when catching the light

It is not possible to capture the beauty of dichroic in a photograph. The glass catches the light giving it unique sparkle and shimmer.

name: Ornate Blue Coasters
description:
Beautiful sparkly Blue Aventurine Glass fused with opaline glass powder decoration.  

Set of 4 - Measures 10cms x 10cms 

Rubber bumpers are attached to protect your furniture

Other colours available, please contact me for details

description:
Dichroic Glass on silver plated cufflink arms. Each piece of glass has been hand cut, layered and then fired in the kiln.

It is not possible to capture the beauty of dichroic in a photograph. The glass catches the light giving it unique sparkle and shimmer.

name: Silver Dichroic Cufflinks
description: Sparkling Dichroic glass on silver plated cufflink arms.

name: Vintage Look Poppy Coasters - Set of 4
description:
Pretty Poppies fused on to a set of 4 coasters. The design on these coasters won't fade or wear away with time.

Each coaster measures approx 10cm x 10cm.

name: Firey Dichroic Glass Cufflinks
description:
Dichroic Glass on sterling silver plated cufflink arms.  Each piece of glass has been hand cut, layered and then fired in the kiln.  

It is not possible to capture the beauty of dichroic in a photograph.  The glass catches the light giving it unique sparkle and shimmer.

name: Vintage Look Poppy Dish
description:
Little Poppies fused on to a cream dish. The design on this dish won't fade or wear away with time.

Measures 14cm x 14cm and is approx 2cm deep.

name: Vintage Look Poppy Candle Dish
description:
Pretty Poppies fused glass candle dish. The design has been fired into the glass and won't fade or wear away with time.

Measures approx 14cm x 14cm.

name: Set of 4 Poppy Coasters
description:
Pretty Poppies fused on to a set of 4 coasters. The design on these coasters won't fade or wear away with time.

Measure 10cm x 10cm.

name: Poppy Dish
description:
Pretty Poppies fused on to a cream dish.  The design on this dish won't fade or wear away with time.

Measures 14cm x 14cm and is approx 2cm deep.

name: Butterfly Pendant
description:
Butterfly on a fine silver pendant. 

Disc measures approx 17mm and comes on a 16" sterling silver sparkly ball chain.

This item will be tested for purity and hallmarked with my own mark at the London Assay Office

name: Teal Green Flower Coasters
description:
Set of 4 10cm x 10cm coasters

Teal green coasters with a delicate flower image. The image is a decal fired on to the surface of the glass and won't scratch or wear off over time.

Rubber bumpers stops are permanently attached to protect your furniture.

Wash in warm soapy water and keep out of the dishwasher and microwave.

Other colours available - please contact me for details

name: Teal Green Flower Accent dish
description:
Delicate flower pattern adorns this rich teal green hand made dish

Measures approx 20cm x 20cms. 

The flower pattern has been fired on to the surface of the glass and will not fade or wear over time. 

Matching coasters available

This dish is food safe but please keep out of the microwave and dishwasher

name: Set of 4 Glamour Girl Coasters
description:
Set of 4 10cms x 10 cms.

Vegas Glamour Girls. The images on these coasters are fired to the surface of the glass meaning they won't scratch or wear off over time.

Complete with rubber bumper stops to protect your furniture

name: Fingerprint Dog Tag for Dad
description:
Perfectly formed little fingerprint in environment friendly, recycled fine silver on a 22" heavyweight ball chain. The pendant is completely hand made in pure silver from fingerprint impressions.


Once you place your order I will send you a moulding kit and instructions to take the print. As soon as I receive the print back I will set about making the necklace.  If you are in a hurry to get these please let me know and I will do my best to get your order out in time. 

Tiny baby's fingerprints are not fully formed so you won't get the detailed lines in the print until they are about six months old

I will keep your fingerprint on file for 12 months so that you can order additional items without having to take seperate moulds. After this time your fingerprint will be destroyed.

name: Fingerprint Star
description:
A perfect gift for a loved one. Your fingerprint can be cast in this fine silver star pendant and hand carved with the words of your choice on the back. (Limited text due to the size) 

This star measures approx 22mm and comes on a 16" chain. 

I will send you a moulding kit and instructions to take the print. Once you send it back to me I will set about making your pendant. Please allow up to 3 weeks to complete your order. If you are in a hurry to get these please let me know and I will do my best to get your order out in time. 

I will keep your fingerprint on file for 12 months so that you can order additional items without having to take seperate moulds. After this time your fingerprint will be destroyed.

To comply to the Hallmarking Act 1973, all items bound for the UK over 7.78 grams will be hallmarked with my very own mark by the London Assay Office If you are outside of the UK and would like your item hallmarked, please leave a note to seller, but be aware that this could add a few days to the turnaround time.

You can learn more about hallmarking here: 

http://www.thegoldsmiths.co.uk/assay-office/hallmarking/all-about-hallmarking/

name: Flower Ring
description:
This ring has been made in eco friendly recycled silver and features two textured hearts and a flower set with a cubic zirconia on a plain band. I have added a lovely patina to show off the detail.

Remember to send me your ring size with your order

As this ring is handmade, please allow for slight variations to the one pictured.

To comply to the Hallmarking Act 1973, all items bound for the UK over 7.78 grams will be hallmarked with my very own mark by the London Assay Office.

name: Childs fingerprint in Silver Heart
description:
Perfectly formed little fingerprint in fine silver. This pendant is completely hand made in pure silver from a fingerprint mould with the name of your choice. Comes with a 16" sparkly ball chain.

I will send you a kit and instructions to take the print. Once you send it back to me I will set about making the pendant. If you are in a hurry to get these please let me know and I will do my best to get your order out in time. 

Tiny baby's fingerprints are not fully formed so you won't get the detailed lines in the print until they are about six months old

I will keep your fingerprint on file for 12 months so that you can order additional items without having to take seperate moulds. After this time your fingerprint will be destroyed.

To comply to the Hallmarking Act 1973, all items bound for the UK over 7.78 grams will be hallmarked with my very own mark by the London Assay Office If you are outside of the UK and would like your item hallmarked, please leave a note to seller, but be aware that this could add a few days to the turnaround time.

name: Fingerprint cufflinks
description:
Perfectly formed little fingerprints in fine silver. These cufflinks are completely hand made in pure silver from fingerprint moulds. 

I will send you a moulding kit and instructions to take the print. Once you send it back to me I will set about making the cufflinks. If you are in a hurry to get these please let me know and I will do my best to get your order out in time. 

Your choice of names and layout of the cufflink. Some of the possibilities are;

Name on 1, print on another,
Same name and print on both
No name just print
Print on both with name on one and date on the other
etc 

Tiny baby's fingerprints are not fully formed so you won't get the detailed lines in the print until they are about six months old

I will keep your fingerprint on file for 12 months so that you can order additional items without having to take seperate moulds. After this time your fingerprint will be destroyed.

To comply to the Hallmarking Act 1973, all items bound for the UK over 7.78 grams will be hallmarked with my very own mark by the London Assay Office If you are outside of the UK and would like your item hallmarked, please leave a note to seller, but be aware that this could add a few days to the turnaround time.

name: Handprint Brooch
description:
This brooch has been created in environment friendly, recycled fine silver, from a scanned image of a childs hand print reduced in size to make a tiny impression of the image.

Once you place your order you send me an email with the prints and I do the rest. 

I can create this with hand, foot or even your pet's pawprint.

Other items are available - if you would like this in a pendant, charm or cufflinks, please contact me for details.

I will keep your print on file for 12 months so that you can order additional items without having to take send me separate prints. After this time your print will be destroyed.

Once your order is received, please allow two to three weeks for your item to be created.

name: Fingerprint Pendant
description:
Perfectly formed little fingerprint in fine silver. This pendant is completely hand made in pure silver from a fingerprint mould with the name of your choice. Comes with a 16" sterling silver chain.

I will send you a kit and instructions to take the print. Once you send it back to me I will set about making the pendant. If you are in a hurry to get these please let me know and I will do my best to get your order out in time. 

Christmas will be here before we know it, please order early. 


Tiny baby's fingerprints are not fully formed so you won't get the detailed lines in the print until they are about six months old

I will keep your fingerprint on file for 12 months so that you can order additional items without having to take separate moulds. After this time your fingerprint will be destroyed.

name: Personalised Necklace with Swarovski Elements
description:
Pretty pendant hand made in fine silver with Swarovski crystals. Hangs from a 16" sterling silver sparkly ball chain.  This necklace can be personalised with a set of initials or a special date.

Pendant measures approx 17mm x 17mm

I also have matching cufflinks which can be personalised on the back. Perfect wedding present for a happy couple. 

To comply to the Hallmarking Act 1973, all items bound for the UK over 7.78 grams will be hallmarked with my very own mark by the London Assay Office. This one has the special Diamond Jubilee Hallmark. You can read more about it here

name: Dichroic Glass Dish
description:
Clear glass dish made with flecks of dichroic glass and mica which catches the light beautifully.  

The photo does not do this dish justice

name: Initial Necklace
description:
2 little fine silver discs - one highly polished with a hand stamped initial of your choice. The other is impressed with a lace pattern, both hang from a sterling silver sparkly ball chain.

As each order is hand made, please expect slight variations to the one pictured

name: Fingerprint Necklace
description:
Keep your loved one close to you at all times. This unique and stylish pendant will make a lovely gift and is perfect for an adult fingerprint. As each one is made to order there will be variations in the design.

The pendant has been crafted in environment friendly recycled fine silver and comes with a 16" box chain. 

I will send you a moulding kit and instructions to take the print. Once you send it back to me I will set about making your pendant. If you are in a hurry to get these please let me know and I will do my best to get your order out in time. 

A special date or initials can be hand carved on the back of the pendant.

I will keep your fingerprint on file for 12 months so that you can order additional items without having to take seperate moulds. After this time your fingerprint will be destroyed.

name: Flower Coasters - Set of 4
description:
Set of 4 10cms x 10 cms.  

Lovely bright red coasters with a deep black flower image. The image is a decal fired on to the surface of the glass meaning it won't scratch or wear off over time.  

Other colours available - please contact me for details

name: Teal Iridescent Dish
description:
Gorgeous colours shimmer from this little fused glass dish. 

This piece measures approx 14.5cms x 14.5cms

name: Textured Fused Glass Dish
description:
Gorgeous hues of emerald and turquoise textured glass. Catches the light beautifully

This dish is food safe but please keep out of the dishwasher and microwave

name: Art Works in Silver
description:
You send me a scanned image of your child's masterpiece and I transform it into a fine silver necklace. Or if you would like me to make your own artwork into a fabulous piece of jewellery please contact me. Pendant hangs on a 16" sparkly ball chain.

Other items are also possible. Please contact me for a quote if you would like this in cufflinks, charms, a keyring..

To comply to the Hallmarking Act 1973, all items bound for the UK over 7.78 grams will be hallmarked with my very own mark by the London Assay Office If you are outside of the UK and would like your item hallmarked, please leave a note to seller, but be aware that this could add a few days to the turnaround time.

name: Fingerprint Dog Tags
description:
Perfectly formed little fingerprints in environment friendly, recycled fine silver on a 22" heavyweight ball chain. The pendant is completely hand made in pure silver from fingerprint impressions.

These tags come in three sizes, perfect for a man with three children (or two children and a wife)

I will send you a moulding kit and instructions to take the print. Once you send it back to me I will set about making the necklace. If you are in a hurry to get these please let me know and I will do my best to get your order out in time. 

Tiny baby's fingerprints are not fully formed so you won't get the detailed lines in the print until they are about six months old

I will keep your fingerprint on file for 12 months so that you can order additional items without having to take seperate moulds. After this time your fingerprint will be destroyed.

This is UK based shop, please allow extra time if you are outside of the UK

To comply to the Hallmarking Act 1973, all items bound for the UK over 7.78 grams will be hallmarked with my very own mark by the London Assay Office If you are outside of the UK and would like your item hallmarked, please leave a note to seller, but be aware that this could add a few days to the turnaround time.

name: Copper Butterfly Coasters - Set of 4
description:
Set of 4 coasters, hand made by fusing copper butterflies between sheets of glass

Coasters come complete with rubber bumpers to protect your furniture

name: Heart Ring
description:
This ring has been made with four textured hearts on a plain band made from eco friendly recycled silver. I have added a lovely patina to show off the detail.

Remember to let me know your ring size. 

As this ring is handmade, please allow for slight variations to the one pictured.  The turnaround time on this is approx 3 weeks, but please let me know if you need it sooner.

To comply to the Hallmarking Act 1973, all items bound for the UK over 7.78 grams will be hallmarked with my very own mark by the London Assay Office If you are outside of the UK and would like your item hallmarked, please leave a note to seller, but be aware that this could add a few days to the turnaround time.

name: Fingerprint Charms
description:
Each charm is made with environment friendly, recycled fine silver. The chain is not included. If you would like a chain they are an additional £10

Please select the shape of charm you would like. 

Once I receive your order I will send you a kit and instructions to take the print. I will set about making the charm as soon as I receive the print back. If you are in a hurry please let me know and I will do my best to get your order out in time. 

Tiny baby's fingerprints are not fully formed so you won't get the detailed lines in the print until they are about six months old

I will keep your fingerprint on file for 12 months so that you can order additional items without having to take seperate moulds. After this time your fingerprint will be destroyed.

This is UK based shop, please allow extra time if you are outside of the UK

Measures approx 14mm

To comply to the Hallmarking Act 1973, all items bound for the UK over 7.78 grams will be hallmarked with my very own mark by the London Assay Office If you are outside of the UK and would like your item hallmarked, please leave a note to seller, but be aware that this could add a few days to the turnaround time.

Silver is defined by its pureness. Fine silver is 99.9% pure. Sterling is 92.5% pure.

name: Butterfly Necklace
description:
Butterfly pendant measures approx 17mm and comes on a 17" sterling silver sparkly ball chain.

To comply with the Hallmarking Act 1973, all items bound for the UK over 7.78 grams will be hallmarked with my very own mark by the London Assay Office If you are outside of the UK and would like your item hallmarked, please leave a note to seller, but be aware that this could add a few days to the turnaround time.

name: Aquamarine RIng
description:
Designed and hand made by Fired Works, this beautiful ring incorporates an aquamarine coloured cubic zirconia and two textured hearts on the shoulders. 

Please ensure you let me know your ring size with your order

To comply to the Hallmarking Act 1973, all items bound for the UK over 7.78 grams will be hallmarked with my very own mark by the London Assay Office If you are outside of the UK and would like your item hallmarked, please leave a note to seller, but be aware that this could add a few days to the turnaround time.

Silver is defined by its pureness. Fine silver is 99.9% pure. Sterling is 92.5% pure.

name: Footprint in SIlver
description:
This necklace is created in environment friendly, recycled fine silver, from a scanned image of a childs foot print which has been reduced in size to make a tiny impression of the image. These necklaces can also be made from handprints or even a pet's paw print.

Once you place your order you send me an email with the prints and I do the rest. 

I will keep your print on file for 12 months so that you can order additional items without having to take send me separate prints. After this time your print will be destroyed.

Once your order is received, please allow two to three weeks for your item to be created. This is UK based shop, please allow extra delivery time if you are outside of the UK. 

To comply to the Hallmarking Act 1973, all items bound for the UK over 7.78 grams will be hallmarked with my very own mark by the London Assay Office If you are outside of the UK and would like your item hallmarked, please leave a note to seller, but be aware that this could add a few days to the turnaround time.

name: Love Birds Necklace
description:
These gorgeous little lovebird necklace is made in fine eco-friendly recycled silver and has been aged slightly to bring out the detail.

Can be personalised with a special date or set of initials.

Comes on a 16" Sterling Silver necklace

Matching cufflinks available making a perfect wedding gift for the bride and groom

name: Shallow Textured Bowl
description:
Beautiful and colourful 20cm textured shallow bowl made with glass in contrasting colours. The pattern on the underside of the bowl is smooth.

Although it is food safe, please hand wash and keep out of the microwave.

Other colour combinations are available made to order, please contact me for details

name: Seahorse Cufflinks
description:
These fine silver cuff links have been hand made with eco friendly fine silver and have been aged to give them an antiqued look and highlight the detail

Cufflink backs are sterling silver

To comply to the Hallmarking Act 1973, all items bound for the UK over 7.78 grams will be hallmarked with my very own mark by the London Assay Office If you are outside of the UK and would like your item hallmarked, please leave a note to seller, but be aware that this could add a few days to the turnaround time.

name: Textured Shallow Bowl
description:
Beautiful and colourful 20cm shallow bowl made with red and turquoise glass. The pattern on the underside of the bowl is smooth. 

Other colour combinations are available made to order, please contact me for details

name: Harlequin Iridescent Dish
description:
Small harlequin hand made dish in beautiful iridescant peacock colours. 

This dish was made by first fusing two layers of glass on a harlequin mould and then refiring to create the shape. 

The dish measures approx 14cms x 14cms

Although this dish has been properly annealed it would be wise to hand wash only and avoid the microwave.

name: Love Birds Personalised Cufflinks
description:
These little button like cufflinks have been hand crafted in fine silver and aged to give them an antiqued look and to bring out the pattern.

These cufflinks can be hand engraved on the back with a date or a set of initials (or a date on one and initials on the other)for a personalised gift

Cufflink arms are sterling silver

Measurements are approx 18mm

All items shipped to the UK are hallmarked with my own mark by the London Assay Office 

Please allow three weeks for your order to ship

name: Ruby Heart Ring
description:
Designed and Hand made by Fired Works, this ring is set with a beautiful heart shaped ruby coloured stone.  Please state the size of the ring when ordering

All silver shipped to the UK will be hallmarked with my own unique mark by the London Assay Office.  

Each ring is individually made by hand so no two will be exactly the same. 

Please allow up to three weeks for your order to be shipped

name: Ornate Coasters - Set of 4
description:
Set of 4 10cm x 10cm fused glassed coasters.  These glass coasters have been made using glass powders and have been properly annealed in the kiln for strength and durability.  Rubber bumper stops are permanently attached to protect your furniture.

They can be made in almost any colour combination.  Please contact me prior to ordering with colour choices, otherwise you will be sent the colour combination shown.  

These coasters are not dishwasher safe.  To look after them and keep them looking their best rinse them in warm soapy water.

name: Poppy Field
description:
Hand Made fused glass wall art.  This piece has been made with glass powders and frit (crushed glass) and has been through several firings in the kiln at different temperatures to achieve the 3d effect. 

Measures approx 15cms x 30cms and can be made in either portrait or landscape.  It comes with invisible wall fixings which stand off the wall allowing light to pass through the panel. A rawl plug and screw is supplied with your order.

Each piece is hand made to order therefore no two pieces will be the same.  Your order will take approximately two weeks from order to shipping.
